column6: The Squadron Supreme has invaded the Ultimate Universe seeking revenge, and Earth strikes back with its biggest guns! It's the smackdown of the year as the Squadron Supreme go toe-to-toe with the Ultimates, the Fantastic Four, the X-Men and Spidey!
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller (cover):Greg Land | colorist:Justin Ponsor | inker:Matt Ryan
